name: Egg Roll (twifkak)
description:
Goal

Play against a friend! Score a goal by being the first to capture an egg into your zone. Play to whatever # of points you desire.

To start

Needs touchscreen. Landscape mode only.

Click to play. Click again to fullscreen. One player takes left, one player takes right.

Controls

Drag inside your red zone to control the angle of the paddle.

Right-click (desktop) or long-press (mobile) to reset the score to zero.

Back button (mobile) to exit fullscreen.

Keyboard shortcuts

R - reset board (maintaining score)

Z - reset score to zero

F - fullscreen

Esc - exit fullscreen
